title: Doll Or Fetish Figure, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: glass beads, leather
Technique: embroidery with beads
description: Crude representation of a man, in small colored glass beads strung together and sewn around a tubular core of leather. Limp arms fastened to head, which is a pouch that fits over the top. Two leather thongs for carrying or fastening at top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Doll Or Fetish Figure, late 19th–early 20th century.
late 19th–early 20th century. Medium: glass beads, leather
Technique: embroidery with beads. Gift of Norvin Hewitt Green. 1938-58-1153.
